start with fresh debian install

install iptables-persistent and dnsmasq

configure network
  wan interface dhcp
  lan interfaace static and only set address

configure dnsmasq
  set interface
  set dhcp-range

enable ipv4 forwarding in /etc/sysctl.conf

write iptables
  normal forwarding rules, replace wan with "nordlynx"

install nordvpn

configure norvpn
  routing must be enabled
    `nordvpn set routing on`

login nordvpn

connect
